regen.absent_element: situation of a user leaving and a new CO taking their place
regen.new_specification: If a user departs early, the system shall replace the user's position with a new Computer Opponent (CO) to continue the game seamlessly.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
